title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.26 - Careless, negligent, or dangerous operation prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.26 - Careless, negligent, or dangerous operation prohibited

State Regulations

No vehicle shall be operated in or upon the airport in a
careless or negligent manner or in disregard of the rights and safety of
others, or without due caution or circumspection, or at a speed or in a manner
which endangers unreasonably or is likely to endanger unreasonably persons or
property, or while the driver thereof is under the influence of intoxicating
liquor or any drug affecting his senses, or if such vehicle is so constructed, equipped, or loaded as to endanger unreasonably or he likely to endanger
unreasonably persons or property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
78.26

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
